Title: Requires the department of labor to collect and report certain information regarding requests for federal Title XII advances for the state unemployment trust fund
Summary: Requires the department of labor to collect and report certain information regarding requests from the governor or the governor's authorized agent for federal Title XII advances for the state unemployment trust fund.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to requiring the department of labor to collect and report certain information regarding requests from the governor or the governor's authorized agent for federal Title XII advances for the state unemployment trust fund
